anathema: Desecrate a corpse, take from the dead in bad faith, trap a soul
area_of_concern_raw: Burial, the dead, funeral rites, mummification, tombs
edict: Lay bodies to rest, destroy undead, be impartial in judgment
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Anubis (Guardian of the Tomb)](/Deities.aspx?ID=511)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 312

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dead or Missing Deities](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=34)

**Edicts** Lay bodies to rest, destroy undead, be impartial in judgment

**Anathema** Desecrate a corpse, take from the dead in bad faith, trap a soul

**Area of Concern**
Burial, the dead, funeral rites, mummification, tombs

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)

**Favored Weapon** [Flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=374)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=118), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=123)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantasmal Minion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1631)

- **3rd**
[Shifting Sand](/Spells.aspx?ID=2365)

- **5th**
[Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1751)

</column>
name: Anubis (Guardian of the Tomb)
